name: github-actions
description: Common GitHub Actions used across my repositories
author: alextheman

scripts.change-major: git diff --quiet && git diff --cached --quiet && (pnpm version major --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "Change version number to v$(jq -r .version package.json)")
scripts.change-minor: git diff --quiet && git diff --cached --quiet && (pnpm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "Change version number to v$(jq -r .version package.json)")
scripts.change-patch: git diff --quiet && git diff --cached --quiet && (pnpm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "Change version number to v$(jq -r .version package.json)")
scripts.format: pnpm run format-package-json && pnpm run format-prettier && pnpm run format-zizmor
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint-package-json && pnpm run lint-zizmor && pnpm run lint-prettier
